titleStmt.title: The rights, powers, and priviledges, of an English convocation, stated and vindicated in answer to a late book of D. Wake's, entituled, The authority of Christian princes over their ecclesiastical synods asserted, &c. and to several other pieces.
titleStmt.author: Atterbury, Francis, 1662-1732.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Atterbury, Bishop of Rochester, by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
